name: Sticky (dubitable)
description:
Use WASD and space to move around, and click to shoot!

Try not to fall to your death!

Very scuffed, but learning bevy was a lot of fun and I definitely felt the same way as when learning Rust: the more I used it and got used to the design, the more I wanted to use it.

Spent ages fiddling with my really rudimentary animation system lol!

Repository: https://github.com/tristanphease/bevy_game_jam
